```{sql connection=}
create database ait580;
use ait580;

create table Volcanos3 (
 RowNumber varchar(255),
 Year varchar(255),
 VolcanoName varchar(255),
 Country varchar(255),
 Elevation varchar(255),
 VolcanoType varchar(255),
 VolcanicExplosivityIndex varchar(255),
 VolcanoDamage varchar(255)
);

select * from Volcanos3 LIMIT 20;
-- Fetching the First 20 rows.

SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM Volcanos3
GROUP BY Country
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 1;
-- INDONESIA has the highest number of Eruptions.

SELECT VolcanoName, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM Volcanos3
GROUP BY VolcanoName
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 1;
-- Merapi Volcano has the highest number of Eruptions. 

SELECT VolcanoType, VolcanicExplosivityIndex
FROM Volcanos3
-- Order by VolcanicExplosivityIndex;
WHERE VolcanicExplosivityIndex = (SELECT MAX(VolcanicExplosivityIndex) FROM Volcanos3);
-- Strato Volcano, Caldera and Sheild Volcano have high VEI.

SELECT VolcanoName, Country, VolcanoType, VolcanoDamage
FROM Volcanos3
ORDER BY VolcanoDamage DESC
LIMIT 10;



```
